title: Finshark
tech_stack: Dotnet, Asp.net, React.js, TailwindCSS, TypeScript, PostgreSql, Docker
description: Developed a Real-time stock tracking system and implemented Secure user authentication with a 99% success rate.
Built an interactive commenting feature to boost user engagement.
Optimized API performance by 30% with DTOs, Interfaces, and Query Parameters.
Integrated FMP API to fetch company data, adding real-time stock information to user portfolios.

title: Tic-Tac-Toe-Game
tech_stack: TypeScript, Express.js, Node.js, MongoDB, React.js, TailwindCSS
description: Set up Stream Chat as an alternative to Socket.io for real-time messaging, improved communication efficiency by 40% in multiplayer gameplay.
Established user authentication with Bcrypt and JWT, enhancing security while supporting 100+ concurrent players in a fully responsive, interactive UI.
highlight: With seamless integration of Stream Chat for real-time communication, players can enjoy an immersive gaming experience while competing against each other from anywhere.

title: RunGroop_RunnersApp
description: Implemented JWT-based session authentication, enhancing login security by 2x.
Designed and deployed a responsive UI using Bootstrap, increasing mobile usability by 60%.
Dockerized and deployed the application on AWS EC2, improving scalability and uptime by 99.9%.
Optimized database queries and models with Entity Framework and PostgreSQL, reducing data retrieval time by 35%.
highlight: Rungroops is an online platform for runners. This platform will help you to find clubs, schedule events, and meet other runners in your area

title: TODO APP
tech_stack: TypeScript, Express.js, Node.js, MongoDB, MERN, TailwindCSS
description: Configured secure JWT-based cookie authentication, enhancing data protection and reducing unauthorized access incidents by 95%..
Built responsive UI with Dark/Light mode, Task sorting, and Priority Indicators, boosting user engagement by 40%.
Utilized Redux and TypeScript for scalable state management and type safety, reducing bugs by 30%

title: Dot Game, Node.js-OnlineGame
description: This project focuses on the development of an online multiplayer game using Node.js, a powerful JavaScript runtime, and Socket.IO, a library that enables real-time, bidirectional event-based communication. The game leverages these technologies to provide a seamless and engaging gaming experience over the internet.

title: Personal Finance Management - API
description: Developed a secure API using Express and Node.js to manage users and their transactions.
Implemented JWT authentication and payload verification to protect user data.
highlight: Secure API for financial transaction management

title: User Authentication using MERN
tech_stack: TypeScript, React.js, Tailwind CSS, MongoDB, Express.js, Node.js
description: Developed a MERN application with strong focus on user authentication and security.
Implemented JWT-based login and registration system.
Designed with a minimalistic and intuitive UI.
highlight: End-to-end MERN auth system with TypeScript

title: Personal Contacts and Users Management - API
description: Created an API to manage contacts and users with full CRUD functionality.
Integrated JWT authentication and tested endpoints using Postman.

title: Music Classes Portfolio and Admission
description: This project is a comprehensive solution for managing a final year collage project using modern web technologies. It utilizes the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) for backend and frontend development, Redux for state management, Firebase for google authentication and real-time database features, and Tailwind CSS for styling. :)

title: Weather Updates App
description: Integrated Weather API to fetch and display real-time weather data.
Built a clean and responsive UI to enhance user experience.
